# HELP jvm_memory_bytes_used Used bytes of a given JVM memory area.
# TYPE jvm_memory_bytes_used gauge
jvm_memory_bytes_used{area="heap"} 2.147483648e+08
jvm_memory_bytes_used{area="nonheap"} 6.7108864e+07
# HELP jvm_memory_bytes_committed Committed (bytes) of a given JVM memory area.
# TYPE jvm_memory_bytes_committed gauge
jvm_memory_bytes_committed{area="heap"} 4.294967296e+09
jvm_memory_bytes_committed{area="nonheap"} 8.388608e+07
# HELP jvm_threads_current Current thread count of a JVM
# TYPE jvm_threads_current gauge
jvm_threads_current 100
# HELP jvm_threads_daemon Daemon thread count of a JVM
# TYPE jvm_threads_daemon gauge
jvm_threads_daemon 80
# HELP process_cpu_seconds_total Total user and system CPU time spent in seconds.
# TYPE process_cpu_seconds_total counter
process_cpu_seconds_total 300.5
# HELP process_open_fds Number of open file descriptors.
# TYPE process_open_fds gauge
process_open_fds 512
# HELP process_max_fds Maximum number of open file descriptors.
# TYPE process_max_fds gauge
process_max_fds 65536
# HELP process_resident_memory_bytes Resident memory size in bytes.
# TYPE process_resident_memory_bytes gauge
process_resident_memory_bytes 1.073741824e+09
# HELP pinot_server_helix_connected_Value Helix connected status
# TYPE pinot_server_helix_connected_Value gauge
pinot_server_helix_connected_Value 1
# HELP pinot_server_queries_Count Total queries count
# TYPE pinot_server_queries_Count gauge
pinot_server_queries_Count 10000
